item.title: Neeed help... Please Easy question
item.dc:creator: @krawks12 krawks12
item.description:
@krawks12 wrote:

Like this(untested)

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("players") && (playerRights >= 1)) { thewindowhere(); } else if (playerRights == 0) { sendMessage("There are currently "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+" players!"); }

See if it works[br][size=1]Posted at: September 13, 2006, 06:32:40 PM[/size][hr]if that doesnt work then try:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("players") && (playerRights >= 1)) { thewindowhere(); } else if (playerRights >= 0) { sendMessage("There are currently "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+" players!"); }

You might have to remove the else in

else if (playerRights >= 0) {
